00018                 : m_object(0)

00025         void CServiceRegistration::FinalConstruct(const guid &riid, IUnknown *pObject, CBundle* bundle)
00026         {
00027                 m_id = riid;
00028 
00029                 m_object = pObject;
00030                 m_object->AddRef();
00031 
00032                 m_bundle = bundle;
00033 
00034                 create_instance_impl(&m_reference);
00035                 m_reference->FinalConstruct(this);
00036         }

00053 
00054         IUnknown* CServiceRegistration::getServiceObject(ServiceUsage* usg)
00055         {
00056                 if(usg && usg->getUseCount() == 1)
00057                         m_users.insert(usg->getBundle());
00058 
00059                 return m_object;
00060         }
00061 
00063 
00064         void CServiceRegistration::ungetServiceObject(Framework::ServiceUsage *usg)
00065         {
00066                 m_users.erase(usg->getBundle());
00067         }
00068

00071         com_ptr<IServiceReference> CServiceRegistration::getReference()
00072         {
00073                 return m_reference;
00074         }

00077 
00078         void CServiceRegistration::Unregister()
00079         {
00080                 if(m_reference == 0)
00081                         throw "IllegalStateException";
00082 
00083                 m_object->Release();
00084                 m_object = 0;
00085 
00086                 // Protect from being deleted until done
00087                 com_ptr_impl<CServiceRegistration> protect(this);
00088 
00089                 m_bundle->UnregisterService(this);
00090 
00091                 while(!m_users.empty())
00092                         (*m_users.begin())->ForceUngetService(this);
00093 
00094                 m_reference->Finalize();
00095                 m_reference->Release();
00096                 m_reference = 0;
00097         }
